Dialogue.Page: Welcome to the <color=orange>Outer Wilds Mod Museum</color>!

DialogueOption.Text: When are you updating Hearthian Golf?
How can I help with the Mod Museum?

Dialogue.Page: My name is Samster68, and I'm the <color=orange>Mod Museum Administrator</color>. I'm in charge of maintaining and expanding the museum.
All exhibits and characters going in and out of the museum have to go through me first. I keep pretty extensive records.
Ah, Hearthian Golf... the black sheep of the Samster68 tetralogy. Even though I am passionate about the mod, I did a terrible job on its launch.

However, the entirety of the next update is already planned out. I would love to give it a quick polish before hosting a tourney or something. I think it would be a lot of fun! The whole purpose of Hearthian Golf was to provide more activities for Quantum Space Buddies.
If the event goes well, I will execute my plans to give the mod a huge overhall and add more content.
Let me know if that interests you!
Thank you for asking! I will need as much help as I can get.

If you are already on the <color=orange>Outer Wilds Modding Discord</color>, you can reach out to me there. There you can find a list of ways you can help out, as well as chat with other incredible mod developers!
Enjoy your time at the museum!
